node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `publicmessages` ( `publicmessages_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `message_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `msgtext` text NOT NULL, `tstamp` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `author_user` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`publicmessages_id`), UNIQUE KEY `message_id` (`message_id`), KEY `tstamp_index` (`tstamp`), KEY `author_user` (`author_user`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
node.title: publicmessages
